Whereas, The Charter under which this Company is
at present organized, is found to be defective in many of
its provisions, affecting the general interests of the Stockholders ; and, Whereas, pending the application of the
I Company to the Legislature of this State, for an act of

Be it therefore Resolved; That the undersigned Stockholders in this Company, representing in their own right,
or as proxy for others, more than one-fifth of the Capital
Stock of the same, do hereby authorize the President and
Directors of the New Orleans, Opelousas and Great
